Package pacman.ghost

Class Blinky

  • Object
    • Entity
      • Ghost
        • Blinky
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Moveable
    public class Blinky
extends Ghost
    Blinky is a ghost that behaves in a very aggressive manner towards a hunter. When not chasing the hunter down, Blinky likes to hang out in the top right corner of the board in a red glow.
    Implemented in Assignment 1

        public Position chaseTarget​(PacmanGame game)
        Blinky targets the hunters position. See: PacmanGame.getHunter()
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        hunter position
        Implement this for Assignment 2

      • home

        public Position home​(PacmanGame game)
        Blinky's home position is one block outside of the top right of the game board. The top left position of the board is (0, 0).

        Note: this will be outside of the board.

        Specified by:
        home in class Ghost
        Parameters:
        game - to read the board from.
        Returns:
        One diagonal block out from the top right corner.
        Implement this for Assignment 2

        Returns:
